translations: adj．最稳定的：在结构、位置或情感上最不容易改变或摇动的。
· This building is the stablest in the area.
这座建筑是该地区最稳定的建筑。

sentences.sentence: Under neutral condition capsaicinoids is the stablest, recta-acid or leaning alkalinity are stronger, more disadvantageous to capsaicinoids.
sentences.translation: 在中性条件下辣椒素最稳定，偏酸或偏碱性越强，越不利于辣椒碱。
